title: Diet sodas are not actually good for your diet, WHO guidance suggests
description: Artificial sweeteners don't help control weight, and that's where the problems start.

title: Cosmic rays reveal hidden ancient burial chamber underneath Naples
description: Rectangular chamber was probably the tomb of a wealthy individual or family.

description: YouTube TV is up 5 percent, and that's before NFL Sunday Ticket kicks in.

description: In break with UK, Europe says Microsoft's promises will remedy cloud-gaming concerns.

title: As AI-generated fakes proliferate, Google plans to fight back

title: Musk’s Tesla tweets to remain on SEC leash, court rules

title: Report: Like Intel’s latest CPUs, Apple’s M3 will lean on small cores to boost speed

title: US states’ social media laws to protect kids create challenges for platforms

title: The complicated history of how the Earth’s atmosphere became breathable
description: Biology, geology, and chemistry all worked together to make the present atmosphere.
